text: Abdul-Rahman bin Abdulaziz (, ; 1931 â€“ 13 July 2017) was a Saudi prince and civil servant. He was a senior member of the House of Saud. From 1978 through 2011, he served as Deputy Minister of Defense and Aviation. His father was Ibn Saud. Rahman died on 13 July 2017 of kidney failure at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Saudi princes and princesses Category:Civil servants
title: Abdul Rahman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud
